main.name: Chandler Lowrance
main.description: I am regarded by my peers as a relentless pursuer of knowledge and wisdom. Learning new skills and pushing my limits through hard work and innovation are when I am at my best. Read on to find out how I could be of service to you.
main.bio: I am a full stack web developer leveraging an international business and economics background to build more well rounded websites and applications. I am currently pursuing a certificate in full stack development from Georgia Tech, with newly developed skills in JavaScript, CSS, HTML, and responsive web design. Known as an innovative problem solver passionate about developing creative and intuitive websites. With each project, my goal is to captivate my users via slick UI interfaces and easy to understand UX mechanics. I have applied this style of agile development in many of my recent projects. In my past profession I managed millions of dollars worth of inventory and worked on an international team that seamlessly delivered goods and services around the globe. Now I get to continue this high level of teamwork and collaboration as I work with fellow developers in my field to create powerful and responsive websites that drive business and commerce forward!
main.contactmessage: To get in touch with me, please reach out to me at the following address or phone number. I look forward to speaking with you and learning about any new oppurtunities!

resume.skillmessage: Below you will find my level of proficiency in the given topic.

education.description: Six-month immersive coding bootcamp covering MERN full-stack development.
Completed 4 year degree with heavy emphasis on business, economics, and German.

work.title: Full Stack Engineer
work.description: Create MERN applications from start to finish for customers, Interface with clients on their desires and then execute them into applications.

work.title: Accounts Manager/International Exports
work.description: Worked under the Vice President of the US subsidiary, Managed multiple customers accounts ordering upwards of 6 million in goods yearly, Worked daily with colleagues in Germany to successfully execute exportation of materials globally

testimonials.text: Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose. You are already naked. There is no reason not to follow your heart.

First, have a definite, clear practical ideal; a goal, an objective. Second, have the necessary means to achieve your ends; wisdom, money, materials, and methods. Third, adjust all your means to that end.
